title: UK: Aravinnd Iyer’s first lead role sees him as a passionate cook
text: Aravinnd has since been noticed and people have been inquisite about his next. Aravinnd revealed to us recently that his next film, which will have him in the lead role, will see him play a passionate chef. The film will be directed by Karthik Saragur of Jeerjimbe fame. "The role is not of a chef, but more like an adige bhatta (cook). The film will be shot across Karnataka and explore the traditional and lesser known cuisines of the state, with food being a binding factor connecting the plot," says Aravinnd. The actor also admits that he is a foodie himself and loves eating different cuisines. "When I lived in the UK , I used to cook myself. Another thing that works to my advantage is that we have a Masterchef India contestant (Ashwin Iyer) at home," he adds.
